meanings.sent1: The movie was superhyped, but it turned out to be just okay.
meanings.sent2: The superhyped concert lived up to its reputation.
meanings.sent3: The superhyped new restaurant had tiny portions, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The superhyped event was like a bright balloon that quickly deflated.
meanings.sent5: The superhyped product was everywhere, like a loud advertisement you couldn't escape.

meanings.definition: To promote or publicize (something) to an excessive degree
meanings.sent1: They superhyped the new phone, but it didn't sell well.
meanings.sent2: The company superhyped their latest product launch.
meanings.sent3: The team superhyped their victory, causing smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: She superhyped her baking skills, but her cake was a disaster.
meanings.sent5: The marketing team superhyped the campaign, making it seem larger than life.
